154.content: What type of fruit does Wanda Li inflate into?
154.title: Wanda Li

1541.content: How does Wanda become an apple?
1541.title: Apple

15411.content:
The day started off normal for Wanda Li and she got ready for school. While getting ready, she was a bit hungry. What she wasn't aware of was that the next thing that she eats, she'll become. The old saying of you'll become what you eat. It was true about her today and she was going to deal with it as it comes.

"Best get something to eat before leaving." Wanda said.

She went down to the kitchen and hoped to find something quick. What she didn't expect was her change of fates. On the counter upon arriving was a...
15411.title: Story 1

154111.content:
...apple. Wanda didn't take notice that it was bigger than a normal apple or juicier than a normal one. Regardless, she took it and began eating it. It was super sweet and she couldn't help but eat it all. That was the best apple she ever had and finished getting ready for school. While she finished up, the apple began taking affect.

"I wonder what Ms. Frizzle has planned today?" Wanda asked.

She eventually was ready and made her way out. It would take a few minutes to get there so it had time to take affect on her. In the mean time, she enjoyed the walk to school.
154111.title: Apple

1541111.content:
Wanda continued to school and thought of all that she might learn. On the way, she stopped at a store that had a mirror outside. It was a couple blocks from Walkerville Elementary so she wasn't too far away. While looking at herself, she noticed a red spot on her face. She thought it was a spot on the mirror until she realized it was on her. Wanda rubbed it as hard as she could but it didn't go away.

"What's going on? I feel a little funny." Wanda said.

The red coloring spread out from her nose and soon covered her whole face and into her black hair. It moved down her neck and into the rest of her body. Her heart raced as she turned as red as an apple to her fear. When her entire body was red along with her clothes, she wondered what she would do now. Wanda turned and hurried to school In hopes that Ms. Frizzle has something to help.
1541111.title: Wanda turns red

15411111.content:
Wanda continued the last couple of blocks to school but noticed a shift in her weight. Another feeling hit her, her weight was increasing and she's slowing down. She quickly looked down and saw her belly growing. She held it to keep it from bouncing around too much or throwing her off balance. A counter weight that was her growing butt began to grow behind her.

"Just my luck. As is being red was bad enough." Wanda said.

She hurried on until she reached the school. By that point, she stopped growing. She was thankful for that but still in a situation. Here's to hoping Ms Frizzle has something to help.
15411111.title: Wanda starts swelling up

1541113.content:
Wanda continued on to school when she felt incredably full. She stopped for a moment and looked down. To her shock and horror, her belly was bigger and swelling up. She nerviously put a hand onto it and it was real. Shaking it with both hands proved it was full of some kind of liquid. It felt a little nice but she didn't want to possibly pop.

"I hope Ms. Frizzle has something that could help with this." Wanda said.

She hurried to the school in hopes she does. If not, she could be in some trouble. Knowing her, she would definitely have something in hand to help. Lets just hope she has it with when shes there.
1541113.title: Wanda starts swelling up

15411133.content:
Wanda continued to hurry to school unaware she was being followed. Eventually she noticed outside the school. Looking at the logo on the side is the van, it was of a local farm that was getting quite famous around town. A woman stepped out and she was the owner. She looked at the ballooning girl and smiled.

"Looks like we found one of the products." The woman said.

"Products? What do you mean products?" Wanda asked.

"Did you eat an apple that was a bit bigger or taste different than a normal apple recently?"

"I did. Is that a problem?"

The woman said it wasn't much of a problem. The problem it has is what's going on with her now. It was not a normal apple but one that was a bit of an experiment. As she she can now see, it's taking affect on her. Wanda asked what could be done.

"Simple, come with us and we'll juice you when your plump and ripe." The woman said.

Wanda got in and they took off. She was taken to the farm to continue growing and be juiced at the right moment. Until then, she just has to wait.
15411133.title: She gets picked up

1542.content: How does a blackberry inflation happen on Wanda Li?
1542.title: Blackberry

1543.content: How does Wanda Li turn blue?
1543.title: Blueberry

choices: The class report Wanda's absence. The employees find Wanda via security cameras
15431.content:
One day, Miss. Frizzle's third grade class was taking a, for once, 'normal' field trip to the local Walkerville candy factory. During the tour, Wanda Li, the class tomboy, had wandered off on her own due to not really paying attention to her surroundings because of her awe at the factory's impressiveness.

She soon found herself in a strange looking room. It looked like the place where the factory's chewing gums were made. While looking around, Wanda noticed a large stick of blue gum. She started to reach for it, only to notice a note next to it.

"'Caution: This gum is highly experimental. Do not chew this gum. Need more testing and correction'." she read aloud. Frowning, she looked at the gum. It looked okay and didn't seem to have anything wrong with it.

"Ah, I'm sure it's fine." she smiled as she grabbed the gum and popped it into her mouth. Within seconds, the stick of gum had been chewed into a soft wad in her mouth. Wanda moaned in delight at the taste.

"Blueberries! I know some company's have tried making blueberry flavored gum before, but this... this actually tastes exactly like blueberries!" She groaned as she eagerly kept chewing faster and faster. Despite this, the gum didn't seem to lose its' flavoring.

She was so busy chewing, that she didn't really notice her nose slowly turning violet-y in color until she looked in a mirror nearby. "What the heck? My nose's goin' purple! I'm turning violet!" She realized in shock and then slight alarm as she kept chewing.

Slowly, as she watched, the indigo coloring began spreading across her face. Looking down at her hands, Wanda then saw they too were becoming indigo in color as well. In fact, her neck, lips and the rest of her body, excluding her hair and clothes, were becoming this color. Even her eyes were now dark indigo in color.

"Miss. Frizzle? Arnold?!?!? Phoebe?!?!? DA??? GUYS?!?!? WHAT'S HAPPENING TO ME?!?!?" She cried out in alarm. Then, she heard a loud burbling noise coming from her tummy. Surprised, she put a hand on her stomach and find it was starting to swell up.

Within seconds she had a large potbelly, which quickly began morphing into a boulder sized gut as she kept a hand on it while it kept burbling and gurgling away. Then, to her shock, she felt her butt puff up, stretching her maroon pants out in the back.

"Wha-?" She whimpered as she looked at her now jumbo butt in fear. "I'm swelling up... like a blueberry!" she squeaked in horror as her body kept ballooning out, her clothes stretching with her.

Then, her cheeks filled up with juice, rendering her unable to talk. "MMMMMMMMPPPHHH!!!" She mumbled through her pursed lips as she began growing fatter and taller now, her belly and bellybutton becoming more and more visible as she did.

"MMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMEEEEEEEEEELLLLLLLLLLLPPPPPPPP!!!!" Wanda whimpered as she felt her arms and legs sink into her now boulder sized body as she rocked and rolled and swayed from side to side slightly on her crotch, failing her hands and feet in desperation, as they, along with her head, were the only body parts visible now.
15431.title: Story 1

choices: The workers explain about the gum. Wanda is deflated via the juicing machine.
154311.content:
Not long after this, Miss. Frizzle, Keesha Franklin, Tim Jamaal, Dorothy Ann Rourke, Carlos Ramon, Phoebe Terese, Ralphie Tennelli and Arnold Perlstein were talking with some of the factory employees. They had noticed Wanda was missing a few rooms back and none of them had really known where she'd gone.

"Her name's Wanda. She has black hair, black eyes and is around our age." DA was saying to the factory owner as the other employees looked for Wanda via security cameras. "Yeah. She wears a pink t-shirt, maroon pants and a matching sweater vest with two yellow flowers and black shoes." added Arnold.

"Alright. When did you say you noticed she was missing?" asked the owner. "When we were getting ready to enter the packaging room, Arnold turned to ask Wanda what she thought of it and noticed she was gone." Miss. Frizzle explained as the others nodded. "She probably wondered off by accident since she probably got caught up in looking around." suggested Phoebe softly.

"Sir?" a younger worker came running up a second later. "Yes, Johnston?" asked Mr. McQueen, looking at said employee. "I think we may've found their missing friend." Johnston explained. "Is she okay?" Ralphie asked as the others also looked at the duo, faces filled with concern.

"Yes, but... well, why don't you see for yourselves." Johnston decided as he led the seven kids and Miss. Frizzle over to the security camera screens, pointing to the gum room. At first, the kids thought it was a giant blueberry that they were looking at.

But then, they also saw the maroon pants, sweater vest, black hair and black shoes of their missing friend on the massive fruit ball. "Is that, Wanda?" asked Tim in shock. "It's wearing her clothes, plus the hairs the same." DA confirmed. "What happened to her?" Keesha asked in disbelief herself.

"She must've tried our new blueberry flavored gum and the side effects occurred." Johnston realized. "What new blueberry gum?" Asked DA with interest.
154311.title: The class report Wanda's absence. The emplo...

1543111.content:
"The blueberry gum was an idea we had about a month or so ago. We were trying to think of a new type of gum to release to the public that was actually fruit flavored instead of merely fake flavoring." Mr. McQueen explained as he, along with the class and several of his employees were heading for the gum room.

"What happened?" asked Keesha as she and the others jogged alongside the factory owner since he was considerably taller than them and even Miss. Frizzle by a few inches. "Well, we managed to make a sample and we began testing it. It does keep it's flavor, but in the process, we discovered it also makes you a massive blueberry, first by turning your skin blue-ish indigo and then swelling your body up with blueberry juice." Mr. McQueen explained as they reached the final turn before the hallway with the gum room.

"So, it's like when I ate too many Seaweedies for a month and they turned me orange." Arnold recalled as the class nodded. "Will she be okay?" asked Ralphie as they reached the door to the gum room. "During the trail run, we found you won't explode, but the juice also fills your cheeks up and renders you unable to talk until you're returned to normal." Mr. McQueen explained as he opened the door.

Together, the large group entered the room to find Wanda slowly and slightly wobbling side-to-side. "Muys! M'm mo' mad mo're mere!" she managed to mumble in delight, smiling as best as she could with her still pursed lips and bulging cheeks.

"What'd she say?" asked Ralphie. "I think she said 'Guys! I'm so glad you're here'." DA translated with a smile as Wanda nodded her head the best she could right then due to her neck having also sunk into her blueberry body.

"Wow. Forget blueberry. Guess Wanda's more of a blue-boulder!" Carlos quipped with a smile. "CARLOS!" The others all frowned as usual during his puns, except Wanda, who merely mumbled a "Marlos!".

""How're you doing, Wan?" asked Tim. Wanda looked down at her now smaller friend, nearly rolling onto her massive front. "Mhat mo mou mink?!?" She mumbled in response.

"She said, 'What do you think'." Phoebe translated now as Wanda merely gave her a look of thanks. "Will she stay this way?" asked Arnold nervously. "Not at all, young man. We just gotta put her in the juicing machine and it'll squeeze the juice out of her." Johnston replied as the other workers nodded.

Soon, three employees were rolling the massive Wanda-berry to the juicing machine's location. "You doing okay, Wanda?" asked Keesha as the others followed. "M'm mokay. Must metting mizzy..." Wanda mumbled back, her indigo eyes rolling in their sockets and she did look somewhat queasy by the time they reached the machine and rolled her into it.

"Okay, Wanda. You're gonna be squished and smooshed so we can get the juice out. Just don't panic and remain calm." Mr. McQueen said assuredly as he started the machine. The doors closed and Wanda felt the conveyor belt under her moving.

"It's not gonna hurt her too awfully, is it, Mr. McQueen?" asked Phoebe with concern for her friend. "Not too much, Phoebe. But I'm afraid she may be a little sore after she comes out." Mr. McQueen answered.

Inside the machine, Wanda reached the first thing. It was a series of wringers, like the kind she enjoyed playing with at the local Y all the time. Before she even knew what was going on, Wanda found herself being smooshed and squished straight through the very tight wringers. As she did, Wanda felt the juice expelling itself out her ears, nose, mouth and rear end. When she was carried out, she was still bloated but considerably smaller than before. This went on and on, until finally, a largely normal Wanda was conveyed out, sopping wet from the blueberry juice and still bright indigo blue, but back to her normal size, her clothes amazingly still their normal size, not stretched out at all.

"Are you okay?" Phoebe asked as she and the others crowded around Wanda while an employee handed her a large fluffy towel to dry off with. "Yeah. I'm fine, Pheebs. In fact, it was kinda cool." Wanda smiled as she finished drying off and then handing the towel back.

"How long'll I stay blue?" she asked upon noticing this pigmentation of her skin had remained. "At least a week." Mr. McQueen said with a kind smile. "Guess I better tell Mom I got covered in blue paint. Don't think she'd believe me if I told her I became a Wanda-Berry." Wanda smiled as she looked at her blue face.

Mr. McQueen was right. Wanda's new skin color only lasted a week and by the following weekend, she was back to being her normal pale color. Luckily for Wanda, her mom did buy her paint story and Wanda secretly vowed to never touch blueberry gum again. In fact, it was a month before she even went near a blueberry again.
1543111.title: The workers explain about the gum. Wanda is def...

1544.content: How does Wanda Li become a cherry red?
1544.title: Cherry

15441.content:
The day seemed normal for Wanda Li as she got herself ready for school. Though this time, it's going to be strange. Of course, Mrs. Frizzles class can always be called strange. But this time, it will be a different strange. One that's not like the class normally would be.

"How different can it be? Her class is always strange somehow." Wanda said.

She was getting her stuff together when something felt off in her bag. Opening it up, she found...
15441.title: Story 1

154411.content:
...a cherry. What's strange about it was that it's bigger than a normal cherry that she's ever seen. She thought it was from Ms. Frizzle's class but it wasn't from her class. It was definitely farm grown and she knew that it was going to be tasty. But something seemed off about it.

"No matter, better eat it before it goes bad." Wanda said.

She ate the cherry on her way out the door unaware it was a geneticaly experimented cherry that was going to change her as well. It was the sweetest and most juicest cherry she's ever eaten and didn't stop until only the stem was left. The thing wa as big as a baseball and she couldn't believe such a large cherry exists. Now that it was gone and in her stomach, she conttinued on to school while wondering what Ms. Frizzle has in class today.
154411.title: A cherry

1544112.content:
Wanda continued on with school and thought of what could happen to them. If that was a clue, it could be a food related class but who knows. On her way, she felt quite full. The cherry was filling as is but this felt like she ate a large breakfast before leaving. It eventually began to grow and she felt like she was going to burst. She look down and her eyes widened.

"What's going on?" Wanda asked.

Before her Wanda's eyes, her belly was pushing out bigger and bigger. She didn't like that and it was soon joined by her butt. Fearing the worst, Wanda took off for school at a hurried rate. She continued to swell up bigger and bigger to her dismay. Her clothes began tightening down on her as she grew making her a bit uncomfortable as it happened. She could feel her body getting heavier as she grew and felt something like water or some other liquid causing her to grow like this.
1544112.title: Wanda starts swelling up

choices: Wanda stops due to her size
15441122.content:
Wanda continued to swell up bigger and bigger by the second. Her movements grew more and more restricted the bigger and heavier she got. The cherry juices slushed around in her as she moved and that was annoying her. Her chest had began swelling up when her belly was a good foot in front of her. She liked it and hoped that she doesn't pop. Of course, that wouldn't happen. While she hurried, Wanda looked at her hands and saw they were red and the coloring was moving up her arms.

"What the? I'm turning cherry red! This is getting stranger and stranger." Wanda said.

The red coloring wasn't just on her arms. It was spreading across her face from her nose. Wanda just pushed on and hoped she could get to the school before getting too big. Ms. Frizzle would have something to help with this. If not, she could be in some trouble.
15441122.title: Wanda turns red

154411221.content:
As Wanda progressed on, she grew bigger and bigger. It didn't take too much longer before she was as completely red. Her clothes were also a cherry red which she didn't mind. But red skin and bloated body was a problem for her. She kept hurrying to school as best she could as she grew but soon saw it not too far away. This was the final push, the last 100 yards to her help.

"I just hope she can help me." Wanda said.

She hurried to the school and hoped Ms. Frizzle had something to help with this. Wanda hurried to her classroom and hoped she was there. She was with a couple of her other classmates. They were shocked at the sight of Wanda and wondered if it could be done. Ms. Frizzle smiled and said she does. But she might not like it. What she had to do was...
154411221.title: Wanda makes it

1544112211.content:
...eat more cherries. Wanda didn't ask why but went with it. She ate 2 more of the large cherries and waited. Ms Frizzle smiled and couldn't wait to see hope big she'll get. The rest of the class soon showed up and saw what happened fo Wanda.

"What did you do to Wanda?" Arnold asked.

"Wanda had consumed now three geneticist modified cherries and becoming a cherry herself." Ms Frizzle said.

They watched as Wanda ballooned up bigger by the second. Her arms straightened out to get sides as they got thicker as well. Wanda felt her heart racing as she grew and couldn't do a thing about it. Ms Frizzle let it happen knowing she was alright. They just hoped she was right.
1544112211.title: Eat more cherries

15441122111.content:
Wanda was concerend about herself now and hoped there was a way to get the juice out. Fortunately Ms Frizzle does have a way and heading there today. The place was a farm that made the cherries that Wanda ate. They got onto her bus like everyday and got going. A few minutes past and they were at the location. She got unloaded and taken away by a couple of the employees.

"Wait, where are you taking me?" Wanda asked.

"To be juiced before you get too big or anything unsavory happens to you." A woman said.

The others followed with to see the process as it happens. The process began and eventually every once of cherry juice was out of her. This was great and all but one thing she was concerned about. Both her and her clothes were still red was still. Wanda was told that they would remain that way for a while before returning to normal. The class continued on until the end of the day.
15441122111.title: She gets juiced

154411221111.content:
The class continued with the tour until they had to return to the school. They were unaware that Wanda was filling up again. It didn't show until they were on the bus on their way back. Wanda sat in her usual spot when she felt it happening. She looked down and saw her belly pushing out again.

"Not again." Wanda said.

Her belly pushedo out bigger and bigger again to her dismay. A couple others saw this and hoped she could be juiced again. It wasn't growing as fast or all over. It just grew as they continued on. When they arrived back at the school, it was resting in her lap. Wanda hoped it doesn't become a problem to her at all. If it wasn't much the first time around, it wouldn't be this time. Fortunately she stopped before getting too big again.
154411221111.title: Wanda starts swelling up again

1544112211111.content:
Wanda didn't like the fact she as blowing up again. She got into class and hoped that all goes well. Unfortunately it was gym class which would make this a bit problomatic. No matter, Wanda went with it. It went on without a problem and she did her best to do it. Part way through class, she felt herself growing again. It wasn't just her belly growing but her butt as well.

"Great. As if being a cherry wasn't bad enough once and growing a gut a second." Wanda said.

The rest of the class saw what's going on with Wanda and watched. She didn't like it and hurried to the locker room. She didn't want this to happen again and without a way to get it out. But she would have to deal with it before it's over. For now, she just watched her butt get absorbed into her lower torso and grow bigger. For some reason, she like this figure. Her gym clothes grew comfortably with her before stopping again. That was a relief but she knew she would get bigger again and be juiced again.
1544112211111.title: Wanda starts swelling up again

15441122111113.content:
Wanda stayed in the locker room for a while longer until someone came in. Her heart stopped for a second before seeing a couple people from the farm. She relaxed a bit but feared a bit of what they would do to her. They looked at the reddened girl and knew it was happening again.

"You're going to take me back to juice me, right?" Wanda asked.

"That's right. Now lets go." The woman said.

Wanda went out with them and into the vehicle. They left for the farm in hopes for more juices by her. Wanda rested her hands on her belly on the way and she wondered what would happen if she gets too big like the ones that have popped. If so, hopefully not in the vehicle. That is, if she does.
15441122111113.title: Wanda gets taken

154411223.content:
Wanda continued to school but her body continued to swell up. Her arms and legs swelled up to the point her arms were up to her sides and her legs were shorter and thicker. The red coloring had finished spreading across her entire body and so did her clothes. She was covered with a cherry red coloring and it wouldn't come out. People were staring at her and she didn't like it. While waddling along, a van pulled up next to her. A woman stepped out and looked at the cherry girl.

"So this is where our lost cherry went to. Quite interesting." The woman said.

"What's going on with me?" Wanda said.

"Get in and I'll tell you."

Wanda got in and they took off. The woman told her that the cherry she ate was from the farm she's employed at was part of an experiment to make bigger and sweeter foods like cherries and such. Though they weren't as sucessful as they hoped. She asked what happened to those who had consumed them.

"What happens to them?" Wanda asked.

"In short, they all became like you with a couple not so fortunate." The woman said.

"How unfortunate?"

"Think along the lines of an overinflated balloon."

They arrived at the farm and got her unloaded. She still was swelling up on the way and still was swelling up. She didn't like it and hoped for the best. Wanda waddled as best she could into a building but was rolled the rest of the way. It wasn't because she couldn't get around or was too slow but she was having increasingly difficulties in such a regard. No matter, she was alright and at the farm to be watched and eventually juiced.
154411223.title: She gets picked up

1544112233.content:
Wanda got herself settled in and comfortable at the farm. They were monitoring her to see what happens. They expect her to be ripe later today but who knows. Wanda started to like this dispite her limitations. No matter, she made do in hopes this doesn't turn bad.

"How she you holding up?" The woman asked.

"Doing alright. How big did the others get?" Wanda asked.

"A little bigger than what you're at now."

Thai make her feel good. While they talked, Wanda felt her body getting bigger. She was indeed getting bigger and they watched as she grew. She found it soon nearly impossible to move when her legs disappeared into her body followed by her arms. She eventually stopped growing and felt like she was going to explode. Wanda was still not liking this but liked how she looked. She was as wide in all directions as she was tall. Now the next step was to juice her.
1544112233.title: Wanda gets bigger

15441122333.content:
Wanda got use to being as big as she is and how she looks. The woman was taking care of the cherry red girl and watched her until she was ready to be juiced. What no one expected was her to be bigger. It wasn't going to kill her her or anything but could be a problem. No matter, Wanda just did what she could in her state.

"Is ther a possibility that I could get bigger before being juiced?" Wanda asked.

"It is possible but you're nearly as big as the biggest ever but possibly would get bigger than that." The woman said.

"I have a reason to believe that is going to happen."

As she expected, she began getting bigger. She didn't like it and was rolled off to be properly monitered. She just hoped she doesn't get too big to be juiced.
15441122333.title: She gets bigger

154411223332.content:
Wanda was far more concerned about her bloated red waistline now than when it started. She was only getting bigger which was being problematic. She was easily one of the biggest berry girls they've had but no where near the biggest ever. She has a ways to go before then and she didn't like it. She was indeed ripening up to be juiced but not fast enough.

"Great, another growth." Wanda said.

"I bet this would make you the biggest ever." The woman said.

Wanda began blowing up again and this time, won't be completely covered by her clothes. She would remain dressed but won't be completely covered. They watched as she pushed out bigger and bigger. Wanda nerviously watched as her belly and chest pushed out further in front of her and her sides further out to both sides of her. Her arms were starting to sink into what were shoulders and her feet were doing the same below her. She couldn't feel the ground below them which made her more concerned.

"Is there anything you could do to stop this?" Wanda asked.

"There is but it didn't end well for the 2 we used it on." The woman said.

That didn't make her feel better. Eventually Wanda stopped growing and can tell she most likely wouldn't get any bigger. She felt she might pop if she does get any bigger. But this felt a bit nice for some reason. They just hope that doesn't happen. Measuring her around her at her widest point, she was now the biggest cherry they had.
154411223332.title: Wanda continues to grow

1544112233322.content:
Wanda hoped that she gets juiced soon before she gets too big or pop. They would get her juiced before too long. That wouldn't happen until she's ripe. No matter, she just sat there in hopes that she would be ready soon. Little did Wanda know was that the rest of class was visiting today as well.

"Ah, yes. They're here." The woman said.

"Who's here?" Wanda asked.

"The rest of your class."

A moment later, Ms Frizzle and the others came around the corner and they saw what happened to Wanda. They were told what happened to her and they were glad she was alright. The woman assured them that she was alright and was waiting to be juiced. They got to feel her body and hoped she doesn't pop.
1544112233322.title: The class visits

15441122333222.content:
The class liked seeing her like this and how well she was doing. Before they left to see the rest of the farm, Wanda let out a moan of pain. That didn't sound good to them for they feared the worst. Fortunately she wasn't going to explode like an overinflated ballon but get bigger. They backed up as she began to get bigger.

"I don't want to blow. Can I be juiced now?" Wanda asked.

"Not at all. We found that letting the person finish swelling and ripening yield better results than those who are juiced while expanding or unripened." The woman said.

The space between Wanda's shirt and pants widened as she grew out in all directions. She was liking this less and less as she grew bigger and bigger. Eventually she stopped growing when she was big enough to fill an entire bed room. She didn't want to get any bigger for she feared she would explode. They wouldn't allow that and would ensure everything would be alright.
15441122333222.title: Wanda gets bigger

154411223332223.content:
Wanda continued to wait to be juiced while the others left to see the rest of the farm. The hours soon past and before she knew it, she was taken to a county fair. She had one idea on what's going on, she was going to be shown off. They loaded her onto a truck and it took off the the county fair. Half an hour past and she was being unloaded.

"Is there a reason for showing me off like this?" Wanda asked.

"Not too much but to show you off and to wait until you're ripe." The woman said.

"Fair enough."

The fair went off without a problem. People passed by and even stopped to admired her. This was embarrassing to her and she just hoped she ripens soon. This was a bit too much for her but she went with it. There wasn't anything she could about it anyways. The fair wasn't going be a forever and she would be there until it ends or she is juiced.
154411223332223.title: Wanda gets shown off

1544112233322231.content:
Wanda continued to be shown off at the fair and liked the attention she got. There were some that disagree with this and hated her but she got more and more people that admire her and how she looks. She liked it and hoped that she continues to get this kind for as long as possible. Unfortunately the fair came to an end after a couple days and she was taken back to the farm. Such a disappointment but had to go back. The day after returning from fair, Wanda felt a bit strange.

"Strange? How so?" The woman asked.

"It feels like all the juices might start gushing out of me at once." Wanda said.

"That's good. That means its time to juice you."

Wanda was rolled to another room to be juiced. The process took a couple minutes to do before every drop was out. She came out of it perfectly and nearly normal. What made her not completely normal is her still red coloring and the belly she has. It wasn't that big nor was it small but nothing to worry about. She could pull off being a few months pregnant or have a basketball under her shirt. That was expected and has happened to all the others that's been juiced. It was the little bit of juice she had that would come out eventually. That or turn into fat. Wanda didn't mind it and was sent home. She just hoped that nothing bad happens.
1544112233322231.title: Wanda gets juiced

15441122333222311.content:
That night, Wanda was playing in her bedroom as she thought about the recent events that week. She'd always read about Violet Beauregarde and thought it cool that she swelled up like Wanda herself had done. Still, she had to admit she was glad to be normal again as she played with her action figures, her new beachball shaped belly jiggling somewhat as she did.

She was just playing a game of Good Guys/Bad Guys when the juices started filling her up again. Wanda didn't even notice until her belly began to feel heavier than normal again. Eyes widening in concern, she looked down to see that, sure enough, her belly was swelling up once more, pushing out as it did.

"Oh no. Not again!" Wanda yelped, grateful her mother was gone for the night, taking her little brother William with her. True, Ms. Li knew about Wanda's swelling due to having practically dragged the story out of Wanda after her being gone for the last few days and now having a bloated belly and red coloring, but she figured her mom would freak if she saw Wanda becoming a cherry again.

Now Wanda felt her butt also swelling up as it was becoming heavier and heavier in size. "Great. It's not bad enough I wasn't a cherry once, now I gotta go through it again." Wanda sighed as she began rounding out all over. To her shock, however, she stopped before reaching the same size as before.

As a result, she just looked like she'd done when she wore a planet shaped costume for the class' play about the solar system a few weeks ago: big and round, but still able to use her arms and legs with ease. Grateful this seemed to be it for her swelling, Wanda went back to playing with her action figures.
15441122333222311.title: Wanda starts swelling up again

15441122333222313.content:
Wanda returned to normal in hopes she doesn't balloon up again. She liked it when she was fully inflated but the juicing was a bit rough. No matter, she liked it and hoped that she does return to completely normal again. She did and was doing well. It's been a couple days since she was juiced and was given a bottle of her raw cherry juices. That was odd but she kept it. She didn't want to eat or drink anything with cherries due to what she's been through which she thought was a normal reaction. They did say when she left, she wouldn't want to consume anything with cherries in it.

"Hey Wanda." Phoebe said.

"Hey Phoebe. What's going on?" Wanda asked.

"Nothing much. Glad to see you're alright. Is that a bottle of your juices?"

"It is. What it?"

Phoebe took the bottle and smelt it. It smelt like the sweetest cherries she's ever smelt and hopefully taste. Wanda warned her that it was raw and might turn her into a cherry as well. Though there was no proof on that. Phoebe drank the whole thing and liked. She just hoped that she doesn't become a cherry like Wanda did.
15441122333222313.title: Phoebe tries her juices

154411223332223133.content:
The girls continued on with the day until classes came to an end. They weren't aware that they were going to start welling up now. They stepped out of the school when Phoebe felt something happening. Wanda stopped and looked back at her. She was about to ask what's wrong until she watched her belly beginning to balloon up. Phoebe put her other hand onto her growing girth and wondered what's going on.

"What's happening to me?" Phoebe asked.

"What does it feel like?" Wanda asked.

"It feels like something's filling up my belly. Like some kind of liquid."

Possibly cherry juices."

"I can taste it. You're also growing as well."

Wanda looked down and saw her belly was growing bigger as well. Her butt was expanding behind her and she didn't like it. The girls continued to grow to their discomfort. Others were watching as it happened which bothered Phoebe but not Wanda. The girls left as they grew in hopes that they could get ahold of the people at the farm.
154411223332223133.title: They both swell up

1544112233322233.content:
Wanda stayed at the fair for the next few days. She grew to enjoy people stopping to admire her large cherry shaped and colored body and her friends came as often as they could after school, often checking on her or telling her news from Walkerville Elementary.

When she was hungry or thirsty, she simply had to tell the woman, who then gave her a soft pretzel, some cotton candy, or other snacks or some water or lemonade in the latter case. Several people were impressed by her appearance and she often received several compliments.

Despite this, Wanda did often miss Arnold, Phoebe and the others, as well as her mom and little brother William. Her mom had been there once since learning of her situation and, though understandably freaked out at first, ultimately accepted it and was assured Wanda would return to normal eventually. At night, she was given a large thermal blanket to stay warm.

Finally, one day the woman came to prepare Wanda for her final appearance as the fair was closing down that Sunday. After that, Wanda would be taken back to the farm to be permanently juiced as the night before, the woman had confirmed Wanda was ripe enough to undergo said process.

As she uncovered Wanda, the woman stared at her in shock. "What?" Wanda asked as she noticed this. "Your skin..." the woman said with a smile. Frowning, Wanda managed to look at one of her hands and saw, to her delight, the redness was rapidly fading, leaving normal colored flesh.

"How--?" She asked. "Because you're officially ripe. We found that when the other victims became ripe, they return to their normal skin colors, but they're still cherry shaped until they're juiced." explained the woman. Wanda nodded and eagerly prepared for her final appearances for the day.

Once again, she was praised and given compliments, though several of her admirers, mainly little kids, wondered why she'd gone from red to fleshy color. At the end of the day, Wanda was rolled onto the truck and taken back to the farm. Once there, she was rolled from the lot to the juicing device.

Once more, she went through the process of getting the juice extracted from her. But this time was different. As she came out of the device, her clothes still in tact and back to their original colorings and her arms and legs visible again, she noticed the employees eyeing her in shock.

"What's wrong now?" she asked. "I'm afraid... you're... well, maybe you should just see for yourself." said the woman as she led Wanda over to a body mirror nearby. Upon seeing her reflection, Wanda stared. Most of her body was normal again but her normally trim belly was still the size of a party sized beach ball used at pool parties.

"But why-?" "Because some juice is now permanently part of your system, it seems. One of the girls before you had the same problem when she was permanently juiced." explained the woman gently. Wanda made her belly jiggle in experimentation. Sure enough, she heard a fairly loud sloshing noise.

"You'll still be able to do your normal interests, but you will have a rather increased appetite, need to use the bathroom considerably more often for the first few weeks and the bloating will remain permanent." the woman also added gently. Wanda was quiet as she thought about this and then nodded.

"Okay. That's fine, I guess." she smiled. Then, her large belly rumbled warningly. "Uh... I gotta go to the bathroom." She blushed as she crossed her legs urgently. The woman quickly pointed the way and Wanda hurried to the toilet quickly. After taking a very long pee, she came out, thanked everybody for helping her and was taken home by the woman.

Sure enough, life did return to normal for Wanda, or at least as normal as it can be with Miss. Frizzle as a teacher. The woman's explanation proved right on the money, though bloated and stuck with a very big appetite, Wanda could still do the things she loved like normal, though for the first few weeks, she often had to take long potty breaks during them before her bladder control returned.

Despite this, she still refused to go near a cherry for two whole months after the incident... just in case they caused the whole incident to happen again, to the amusement of her mother and friends.
1544112233322233.title: She loses color

info.brief_description: Inflate your favorite characters from the magic school bus into Blueberries!
info.description:
Rules:

1. Keep it clean.
2. Other type of Fruit Inflations are welcomed.
3. Have fun at Walkerville Elementary School with Blueberry skin and juice!
info.pretty_title: The Magic Blueberry School Bus Story
